message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1350000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're willing to pay more for the product, but I still think it's worth more to me. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $1300000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to make a counteroffer of $1325000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go that high, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $1300000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to offer $1312500.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go that high, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I'll offer the product to you for $1295000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I appreciate your effort to reach a compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to offer $1300000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go that high, but I'm willing to make another small concession. I'll offer the product to you for $1290000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to offer $1295000.
